dimensions:
Chocolate pot H x W x D: 17.7 x 11.1 x 15.5 cm (6 15/16 x 4 3/8 x 6 1/8 in.)
Lid H x diam.: 7.2 x 7.2 cm (2 13/16 x 2 13/16 in.)
title: Chocolate pot and lid
provenance: From the collection of Eleanor G. Hewitt
description: Tall, slightly swelling body, long loop handle, short spout; high domed lid with finial in the form of a draped female figure.  Sides of body (lower portion) and lid with basket-weave texture; wide band top section of body plain.
name: Chocolate pot and lid
